short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically fetches title and description from a URL and fills them into the QuickPanel Campaign creation form.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QuickPanel Campaign Auto-Fill is the ultimate tool to streamline your campaign creation process. With this extension, you can automatically fetch titles and descriptions from any webpage and effortlessly fill in your QuickPanel Campaign creation form.

### Key Features:
- üöÄ Autofill Campaign Fields: Save time by automatically populating the title, description, and URL fields.
- üîç Fetch Data from Any URL: Instantly retrieve webpage metadata to eliminate manual data entry.
- ‚ú® Easy-to-Use Interface: Simple and clean design for a seamless user experience.
- üîí Secure and Reliable: Your data remains safe and private.


### How It Works:
1. Enter the URL in the extension popup.
2. Click the Fetch button to retrieve the title and description.
3. Watch as the fields in your QuickPanel Campaign form are autofilled.

Whether you're a marketer, a business owner, or simply looking to save time, QuickPanel Campaign Auto-Fill is here to optimize your workflow. 

Say goodbye to manual copy-pasting and hello to efficiency!
